meta_description: Vermont Center for Photography is a non-profit organization in Brattleboro, Vermont dedicated to promoting the photographic arts throughout the region.
admission_text:
## VCP Membership

_Please note that if membership cost is a barrier for you, please contact us to find out about our financial assistance options. (Membership fees are non refundable)_

[Signup or renew your membership here!](https://secure.lglforms.com/form_engine/s/w9KcEaO6jZui72sMd9XOpw?t=1682709126)

### **Student Membership – $25**

_All of the benefits of the Standard Membership (except NARM) plus…_

• Discounted membership rate – proof of educational enrollment may be required

• Discounted entry fee for juried exhibitions

### **Standard Membership – $100**

__

• **Invited to exhibit your work** in any of our annual members’ group exhibitions (_no entry fee_)

• **50% discount** on darkroom and digital lab rental _($7 per hr instead of $14/hr)_

_•**15% discount** on our fine art printing services  
_

• **Discount** on workshops, classes, and private tutorials

• **Discounted entry fee** to any juried exhibitions at VCP

• **Have your photo book available** for purchase in the VCP BOOKSHOP, both in-person and online

• **Ability to check books out of our lending library** to enjoy in the comfort of your own home

• **Members are invited to submit** to have their photography featured on VCP’s Instagram account

• VCP membership includes the benefit of becoming a member of **NARM** (_North American Reciprocal Museum Association_), which will allow you free admission to over 1200 arts, cultural, and historical institutions along with botanical gardens, children’s muse...
